steam_ugc_set_item_preview: This function will set the preview image to be used for the given item. The image should be supplied as either a PNG, JPG or GIF format file with a maximum size of 1MB. The path to the image should be a relative path in the save are or the game bundle (ie: an included file). The update handle is the value returned when you called the function steam_ugc_start_item_update(). The function will return true if the API was successfully accessed and false if there was an issue.
